challenge(address).details: opponent will go firstgame id is increated each time a new game is createdseason is over when timer (soon to be added) is past

params._columnNumber: selected column for move, starting at 1

params.columnIndex: selected column for move, starting at 0

gameId.details: Initialised at 1 because getGameIdFromAddress initializes mappings to 0.

getGame.details: This automatically generates a getter for us, which will return `Game.player1`, `Game.player2`, `Game.moves`, and `Game.finished` (the arrays are skipped)

GameOver().notice: revert if game has been completed

InvalidSelection().notice: revert if column choice is invalid

NotYourTurn().notice: revert if caller isn't current team

TurnTaken(uint256,address,uint8).notice: emitted after turn is successfully taken

abandonCurrentGame().notice: Abandons the singleton game of msg.sender, if it exists. The game will still continue to be playable via makeMoveById, just not makeMove.

challenge(address).notice: challenge an address to a game of connect four

gameId().notice: Used as a counter for the next game index.

getGameIdFromAddress(address).notice: An index of address to gameId

makeMove(uint256).notice: caller plays a turn in their current game
